feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, solid coil of wire with defined boundaries.
feedback.Synthetic: Included — Manufactured via industrial metallurgical processes.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — No biological origin or design inspiration.
feedback.Powered: Included — Designed to operate by having electric current passed through it.
feedback.Structural: Included — Its coiled form is designed to resist deformation at high temperatures.
feedback.Observable: Included — Visible as the light-emitting element within a larger assembly.
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Composed of tangible tungsten metal.
feedback.Active: Included — Heats up and radiates light and thermal energy when powered.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Included — Engineered to produce light through incandescence.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Included — Its primary function is to output light and heat.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — Does not interpret or manage data.
feedback.State-Transforming: Included — Transitions between a cold, inert state and a hot, glowing state.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not designed for direct human manipulation.
feedback.System-integrated: Included — Always functions as a core component within a larger system (e.g., a light bulb).
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — Entirely dependent on an external power source.
feedback.System-Essential: Included — The system (an incandescent bulb) cannot perform its function without it.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Any symbolism is contextual, not intrinsic to the object.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not inherently encode or transmit structured information.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — Obeys physical laws, not abstract or formal rules.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not an abstract system composed of meaningful modules.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not guide or constrain behavior.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — Not defined by a time-based sequence or identity.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists as a material object independent of social agreement.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined by any formal institution.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not tied to social or personal identity.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — While its use in bulbs is regulated, the filament itself is not.
feedback.Economically Significant: Included — A key historical and industrial component in lighting technology.
feedback.Politicised: Included — Central to political debates and legislation regarding energy efficiency and the phase-out of incandescent technology.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not used in any formal cultural or ceremonial practice.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Included — Directly tied to ethical considerations of energy waste and environmental impact.

encoding_notes: This encoding captures the tungsten filament as a key technological component. It includes not only its physical and functional roles but also the intrinsic economic, political, and ethical significance arising from its use in a globally impactful technology. The UHT code was corrected to include the 'System-Essential' trait, resulting in final code DFB5000D.
